reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish, with one noting it looks very expensive, and appreciate its nice fit, particularly the long sleeves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: I really like this sweater! It’s lightweight and I love the crochet effects that gives it a bit of style. I haven’t worn sweaters in a number of years because of “personal summers” that plague me year round. This one is lightweight enough to keep the chill at bay without overheating me. The color is a nice creamy white with chocolate brown around the cuffs. It’s well made and doesn’t have a weird chemical smell. I like it enough to consider purchasing additional colors. For reference, my stats are 5’6”, 190lbs. I ordered a large and it fit well with plenty of length in the arms. Read more
items.author: Kimberly G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: I think the sweater is so cute and comfortable. I do get a lot of compliments on it. The fabric is soft and the fit is great. Definitely would recommend. Read more
items.author: dog lover

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely color and feel
items.body: 4.5 stars. I am finally able to wear this sweater as the weather starts to turn a little cooler. The fabric feels like a cotton blend, very comfortable without being itchy. The open knit makes this sweater stand out. It's not so open that you would absolutely need an undershirt for anything but warmth, but as I work in a conservative environment, I wear a tank or cami under mine. I will definitely need to as the temperature gets cooler, however. The pink is a lovely blush shade that coordinates with a ton of things already in my closet. Although I am normally a large, I always order an extra large on Amazon. In this shirt, it feels a bit more oversized than I was expecting, so it looks slightly more casual. The sleeves are a bit blousen and a little oversized for my taste, but the fitted wrist cuff keeps them from sliding down. Overall, I feel pretty in this sweater and will wear it often through 3 seasons. Read more
items.author: Beth Beigh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality
items.body: I bought this sweater for a project. i plan to embellish it. Its LOVELY! great quality. heavy weight. fits perfectly. Way nicer than i imaged for the price! very comfortable and a beautiful weave or knit to the fabric. Read more
items.author: Althea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and versatile sweater
items.body: This is a very pretty sweater in both yarn and design. The combination of hunter green with white yarn makes it look interesting as the light catches on it. I was concerned as it was called "green black," that it would be too dark rather than look green. It is a lovely winter green color. The sweater is true to size and the cinched in cuffs make it work well even for individuals with short arms. It is casual enough to wear with jeans, but also nice enough for work with dress pants. Read more
items.author: LD Martin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too big all over
items.body: This is a really cute sweater. The red is true to the picture color. It seems well made. But, they need an xs or a petite size. I’m 5’ 115lb so it’s hard to find pants that fit but I almost always wear a small in tops. This is just too big all over. Read more
items.author: Chris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: Love the color and how this fits. Also very soft and not too heavy Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lace style long sleeve in gorgeous green
items.body: Very pretty, unique green color. The lace was a little bigger holes than I was expecting so it’s not warm but with a tank top underneath it’s very cute. Read more
items.author: Alyssa80

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B Mist Green, B Sky Blue, B Dusty Pink, B Blackish Green, A Gray, B White Brown, A Brown, B Red Dahlia, C Crewneck White, B Apricot Pink, C Crewneck Parchment, B Meadow Mist Green, B Fern Green, B Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
